activities:
As part of ZS Associates professional services in connection with marketing, sales and operations (including, without limitation, Software As A Service (hosting services), management consulting, business technology consulting, operations consulting and market research), ZS Associates processes data and information, including personal data, on behalf of its customers.  In this context, ZS Associates typically acts as a data processor on behalf of its customers.

As part of its global operations, ZS Associates handles and transfers personal data of its employees and non-employee personnel of ZS Associates and its affiliates to ZS Associates' U.S. headquarters for processing and storage.  In this context, ZS Associates is a data controller

As part of its global operations, ZS Associates handles and transfers personal data of its clients and vendors to ZS Associates' U.S. headquarters for processing and storage.  In this context, ZS Associates is a data controller.
